function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential spread of viruses in indoor environments due to lack of contactless systems and air purification.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased energy costs and greenhouse gas emissions if uv filter glass and transparent solar panels are not properly implemented.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective or improper implementation of air purification systems and antimicrobial materials.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper cleaning strategies and technologies leading to increased pathogen transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate design for pandemic response leading to lack of emergency facilities and infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing uvgi technology without proper precautions for human exposure to uv radiation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential reliance on a single bio sensor for virus detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of plastic barriers without proper maintenance and monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to uv radiation from mobile uv devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective or inadequate use of bipolar ionization devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to detect viruses in buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of paint nature and endurance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of antimicrobial particles in paints","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper installation or maintenance of air ionization systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of copper touch surfaces in existing buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expensive cost of copper material and maintenance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for more research on indoor plant requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of antimicrobial paint on surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing buildings not designed to reduce transmission of communicable diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of smart building materials containing titanium dioxide tio2 nanoparticles for depollution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration in buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective disinfection systems for pathogen control","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to harmful chemical disinfectants and sanitizers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air pollution from building materials and products","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bio composite materials as an alternative to reduce indoor air pollutants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nbpi may produce reactive ions and reactive oxygen species in the air, which could have unknown health effects.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nbpi has been adopted in various types of buildings, but its effectiveness in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases like coronaviruses needs to be further studied.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disinfectant fogging systems may pose a health risk if not properly regulated and applied, leading to exposure of building occupants to harmful chemicals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation of uvgi without proper maintenance can lead to reduced effectiveness and potential health risks from exposure to uv light.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research and regulation of air-purifying plants may lead to inconsistent efficacy and potential health risks from plant-related allergens or toxins.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation and maintenance of vertical greening systems may result in reduced air purification efficiency and potential structural damage to buildings.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hygienic flooring materials such as wood, bamboo, and cork may not be effective in preventing virus spread in indoor environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct exposure to uv rays from germicidal sources can be harmful to human eyes and skin","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of air and surfaces in indoor environments may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of copper-incorporated construction products and elements.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High maintenance costs of copper materials.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combining plastics with antimicrobial substances like copper, silver, and zinc.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inappropriate hvac systems for disinfection may lead to ineffective virus control.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on various materials may contribute to the spread of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation due to conflicting guidelines on co2 concentration and airflow","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and humidity control leading to virus persistence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of virus deactivation requirements for hvac systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in retrofitting air filtration units with hvac systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contactless systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air quality and contamination hazards","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of safe physical distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-thermal plasma technology airphx reducing viruses, bacteria, and mold by 90-99% in the air and on surfaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of ’contactless pathways’ to reduce covid-19 disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
